Title: Simhavalokana 2025: 10 things that Mr Market taught us in the year gone by
Source: LiveMint - Markets
Published: 2025-12-28 11:30
Related Stocks: General Market News
Categories: markets

Summary:
Forget 2026 predictions—the real gold lies in the rear-view mirror. From India’s global investing pivot to the strange resilience of the IPO juggernaut, explore 10 surprising lessons the market taught us during the unpredictable, rule-breaking year that was 2025.

Sentiment: neutral
